remarks: The vectors (vector base set) of the constructed partial vector space A are all translations (for a fiducial co-atom ` W ` ).  (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2013.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 22-Jun-2014.)
statement:
dvavbase.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvavbase.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvavbase.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvavbase.v $e |- V = ( Base ` U ) $.
dvavbase $p |- ( ( K e. X /\ W e. H ) -> V = T ) $.
